title: BADecker
author: BADecker
content: Unfortunately the article is very negative and goes on to downplay the risks and call them……….conspiracy theories. The same people who told you the vaccine will stop transmission, the vaccine stays in your arm, the vaccine is safe and effective, etc., are downplaying the risks of mRNA spiked blood. Folks, most of what was called a conspiracy theory by the government and main stream media is now FACT. It’s better to be safe than sorry.Demand for Unvaccinated Blood SoaringQuote from: https://vaccineimpact.com/2022/demand-for-unvaccinated-blood-soaring/Demand for unvaccinated blood is surging worldwide. Bacteria, viruses, prions, and parasites can be transmitted by blood transfusions likewise people vaccinated with the mRNA vaccine have the SARS-CoV-2 spike protein in their blood. The spike protein (travels the entire body) caused by the COVID-19 vaccination [to] last for months (potentially permanently in the body for those who frequently take booster shots).There are new blood banks being set up in 18 countries so far, that provide this 'pure blood.'From The Vice News article:Anti-vaxxers are trying to create a new global infrastructure for the supply of unvaccinated blood, driven by conspiracy theories and pseudoscientific beliefs about the dangers of mRNA COVID vaccines....

comments.body: Wanna get scared s**tless? Here is why the demand for clean, unvaccinated blood is soaring. Watch the video. Better than any horror movie for a scare. Why? Because it is real.World Premiere: Died Suddenly (Publisher Recommended) Quote from: https://rumble.com/v1wac7i-world-premier-died-suddenly.htmlWhy do we never believe them? For centuries, the global elite have broadcast their intentions to depopulate the world - even to the point of carving them into stone. And yet… we never seem to believe them.The Stew Peters Network is proud to present DIED SUDDENLY, from the award winning filmmakers, Matthew Skow and Nicholas Stumphauzer.They are the minds behind WATCH THE WATER and THESE LITTLE ONES, and now have a damning presentation on the truth about the greatest ongoing mass genocide in human history....

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Some clarification of the "Died Suddenly" video can be found here https://www.naturalnews.com/2022-11-25-died-suddenly-film-is-a-powerful-showcase-of-vaccine-dangers-where-is-dr-jane-ruby.html#... the main one being, why isn't Dr. Jane Ruby in the video, since she was the first person to bring this whole clot clarification to light?
